title: lean Code: A Handbook of Agile Software Craftsmanship
author: Robert C. Martin
description: Even bad code can function. But if code isn't clean, it can bring a development organization to its knees. Every year, countless hours and significant resources are lost because of poorly written code. But it doesn't have to be that way.

Physical.description: Physical paperback/hardcover edition available at retail locations

sources.name: New York Public Library - Tech Collection

title: The Hobbit
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
description: Bilbo Baggins is a hobbit who enjoys a comfortable, unambitious life, rarely traveling any farther than his pantry or cellar. But his contentment is disturbed when the wizard Gandalf and a company of dwarves arrive on his doorstep one day.

Physical.description: Physical paperback/hardcover edition available at retail locations

title: Atomic Habits: An Easy & Proven Way to Build Good Habits & Break Bad Ones
author: James Clear
description: No matter your goals, Atomic Habits offers a proven framework for improving--every day. James Clear, one of the world's leading experts on habit formation, reveals practical strategies that will teach you exactly how to form good habits, break bad ones, and master the tiny behaviors that lead to remarkable results.

Physical.description: Physical paperback/hardcover edition available at retail locations

title: Design Patterns: Elements of Reusable Object-Oriented Software
author: Erich Gamma, Richard Helm, Ralph Johnson, John Vlissides
description: Capturing a wealth of experience about the design of object-oriented software, four top-notch designers present a catalog of simple and succinct solutions to commonly occurring design problems.

Physical.description: Physical paperback/hardcover edition available at retail locations

sources.name: Books Inc - Opera Plaza
sources.address: 601 Van Ness Ave, San Francisco, CA 94102

title: The Pragmatic Programmer: Your Journey to Mastery
author: David Thomas, Andrew Hunt
description: Written as a series of self-contained sections and filled with classic and fresh anecdotes, thoughtful examples, and interesting analogies, The Pragmatic Programmer illustrates the best approaches and major pitfalls of many different aspects of software development.

Physical.description: Physical paperback/hardcover edition available at retail locations

title: Deep Learning
author: Ian Goodfellow, Yoshua Bengio, Aaron Courville
description: The text offers mathematical and conceptual background, covering relevant concepts in linear algebra, probability theory and information theory, numerical computation, and machine learning. It describes deep learning techniques used by practitioners in industry.

Online.description: Free online edition with full access

Physical.description: Physical edition available through academic channels

title: The Lean Startup: How Today's Entrepreneurs Use Continuous Innovation
author: Eric Ries
description: Most startups fail. But many of those failures are preventable. The Lean Startup is a new approach being adopted across the globe, changing the way companies are built and new products are launched.

Physical.description: Physical paperback/hardcover edition available at retail locations

sources.name: Austin Public Library - Central
sources.address: 710 W Cesar Chavez St, Austin, TX 78701

title: Human-Computer Interaction
author: Alan Dix, Janet Finlay, Gregory D. Abowd, Russell Beale
description: Much has changed since the first edition of Human-Computer Interaction was published. Ubiquitous computing and rich sensor-filled environments are finding their way out of the laboratory, not just into movies but also into our workplaces and homes.

Physical.description: Physical paperback/hardcover edition available at retail locations

title: Mindset: The New Psychology of Success
author: Carol S. Dweck
description: After decades of research, world-renowned Stanford University psychologist Carol S. Dweck, Ph.D., discovered a simple but groundbreaking idea: the power of mindset. In this brilliant book, she shows how success in school, work, sports, the arts, and almost every area of human endeavor can be dramatically influenced by how we think about our talents and abilities.

Physical.description: Physical paperback/hardcover edition available at retail locations

title: The Art of Computer Programming
author: Donald E. Knuth
description: This multivolume work on the analysis of algorithms has long been recognized as the definitive description of classical computer science. The three complete volumes published to date already comprise a unique and invaluable resource in programming theory and practice.

Physical.description: Physical paperback/hardcover edition available at retail locations

title: PHP and MySQL Web Development
author: Luke Welling, Laura Thomson
description: Learn PHP and MySQL programming - the practical guide to developing dynamic web applications using PHP and MySQL database. This comprehensive book covers everything from basic PHP syntax to advanced database interactions, form processing, security, and modern best practices for building robust web applications.

Physical.description: Physical paperback/hardcover edition available at retail locations

twitter_embeds.text: Just finished PHP and MySQL Web Development - excellent resource for anyone starting with backend development! The database design chapters are gold. #PHP #WebDev
twitter_embeds.author: DevMaster

title: JavaScript: The Good Parts
author: Douglas Crockford
description: Most programming languages contain good and bad parts, but JavaScript has more than its share of the bad, having been developed and released in a hurry before it could be refined. This book scrapes away these bad features to reveal a subset of JavaScript that is more reliable, readable, and maintainable.

Physical.description: Physical paperback/hardcover edition available at retail locations

twitter_embeds.text: JavaScript: The Good Parts completely changed how I write JS. Every frontend developer should read this at least twice! #JavaScript #WebDev
twitter_embeds.author: FrontendGuru

title: Modern PHP: New Features and Good Practices
author: Josh Lockhart
description: PHP has transformed from a simple scripting language into a powerful, modern programming language capable of handling complex web applications. This book teaches you modern PHP features and best practices, covering namespaces, traits, generators, closures, and the latest PHP standards.

Physical.description: Physical paperback/hardcover edition available at retail locations

sources.name: PHP The Right Way
sources.description: Modern PHP best practices and standards

twitter_embeds.text: Modern PHP by Josh Lockhart is a game-changer for PHP developers. Shows how far PHP has come as a serious programming language! #PHP #ModernPHP
twitter_embeds.author: PHPSavant

title: HTML and CSS: Design and Build Websites
author: Jon Duckett
description: A full-color introduction to the fundamentals of HTML and CSS for creating beautiful, standards-compliant websites. Every page is packed with visually engaging examples, practical techniques, and clear explanations that make learning HTML and CSS intuitive and enjoyable.

Physical.description: Physical paperback/hardcover edition available at retail locations

sources.name: Prairie Lights Books
sources.address: 15 S Dubuque St, Iowa City, IA 52240

sources.name: W3Schools
sources.description: Interactive HTML and CSS tutorials with examples

twitter_embeds.text: HTML and CSS by Jon Duckett is the most beautifully designed programming book I have ever seen. Perfect for beginners! #HTML #CSS #WebDesign
twitter_embeds.author: DesignWizard

title: Vue.js: Up and Running
author: Callum Macrae
description: Get up and running with Vue.js quickly and build production-ready applications with this comprehensive guide. Learn Vue fundamentals, component architecture, state management, routing, and modern development practices for building interactive web applications.

Physical.description: Physical paperback/hardcover edition available at retail locations

sources.name: Books Inc - Opera Plaza
sources.address: 601 Van Ness Ave, San Francisco, CA 94102

sources.name: Vue.js Official Guide
sources.description: Official Vue.js documentation with interactive examples

twitter_embeds.text: Vue.js: Up and Running is perfect for developers who want to quickly master Vue 3 and Composition API. The practical examples are invaluable! #VueJS #JavaScript
twitter_embeds.author: VueExpert
